function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Comparison of articles from 2019 and 2020 in the Scopus journal database may indicate changing trends in green building research, potentially impacting future developments.","Impact":"Failure to identify and adapt to changing trends may lead to outdated or ineffective approaches in green building.","Mitigation":"Regularly monitoring and analyzing trends in green building research to inform future developments and strategies.","Technologies":"Data analysis and visualization tools to track and interpret trends in research publications.","People":"Researchers, developers, policymakers, and industry professionals involved in green building research and development.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and industry organizations."},{"Description":"Increase in the number of articles on green building may indicate a growing interest and focus on sustainable construction practices.","Impact":"An increase in green building research may lead to the adoption of more sustainable and environmentally friendly construction methods.","Mitigation":"Promoting and supporting sustainable construction initiatives and providing incentives for green building research.","Technologies":"Green building technology, sustainable construction materials, and energy-efficient design solutions.","People":"Researchers, architects, engineers, construction industry professionals, and policymakers.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, construction firms, and environmental organizations."}]}
